document (multi-version) | Schmidt_2010

The Multi-Version Document or MVD mode represents all the versions of a work, whether they arise from corrections to a text or from the copying of one original text into several variant versions, or some combination of the two, as four atomic operations: insertion, deletion, substitution, and transposition (Schmidt and Colomb, 2009).
